raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

Optionally, the DR5 antibody of the invention binds to a DR5 receptor at a concentration range of about 0.1 nM to about 20 mM as measured in a BIAcore binding assay.
Optionally, the DR5 antibodies of the invention exhibit an Ic 50 value of about 0.6 nM to about 18 mM as measured in a BIAcore binding assay.
Optionally, the DR4 antibody of the invention binds to a DR4 receptor at a concentration range of about 0.1 nM to about 20 mM as measured in a BIAcore binding assay.
Optionally, the DR4 antibodies of the invention exhibit an Ic 50 value of about 0.6 nM to about 18 mM as measured in a BIAcore binding assay.
